comments.html: In a cisco press book it points out that the administrative distance was 0 because it was directly connected
comments.name: Anonymous

comments.html: As I wrote, that was very long time ago, it's an interesting bit of IOS trivia, but somewhat irrelevant for the current CCNA students.
comments.name: Ivan Pepelnjak

comments.html:
Dear Mr Pepelnjak
In Wikipedia http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Administrative_distance is posted that Administrative distance of Static route out an interface is 1, but "Actual administrative distance is recognized somewhere between 0 and 1. This AD is more trustworthy than 1 but less trustworthy than 0."
Is it true?
comments.name: Anonymous

comments.html: Never tried it. I guess it would also be IOS release dependent.
comments.name: Ivan Pepelnjak
